alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 2:12AM MST until March 02 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Globe/Miami. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 7 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 15 degrees could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
